analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nahetuṁ nosaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum no saññojanam dhammam paṭicca hetu saññojanaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ noganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum nogantham dhammam paṭicca hetu ganthaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ nooghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum no ogham dhammam paṭicca hetu oghaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum no yogam dhammam paṭicca hetu yogaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ nonīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum no nīvaraṇam dhammam paṭicca hetu nīvaraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ noparāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum na uparāmāsam dhammam paṭicca na hetu parāmāsaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
